name: Sangizar Restaurant
address: 1371 Coney Island Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11230, USA

reviews.text: Yesterday, I went out with my family for dinner. We had fish, and it was one of the best meals I‚Äôve had in a long time. The taste was perfect, and I really enjoyed the evening with my family.
I was at this place food is horrible Highly recommend don‚Äôt go this restaurant!!! they use very smelly meat for food and the workers were really un respectful towards us!

I visited this place with high hopes, but I got treated badly, customer is service is really bad, when they brought out my food it had some type of smell to it, like expired meat, overall I would not recommend.
We ordered fish and it was very tasty.

Absolutely outstanding experience! This restaurant offers a top-notch meat selection ‚Äî from juicy steaks and perfectly grilled mixed meats to tender lamb chops and authentic Uzbek plov. Every dish was packed with flavor and cooked to perfection. The chef was not only highly skilled but also very friendly, which added a personal touch to the meal. Service was attentive and welcoming, and the atmosphere was warm and inviting. Highly recommend for anyone who loves great food and a memorable dining experience!
Very good place the food is amazing especially BATONCHIK favourite I love this place recommend mmm yummy

Stopped in on a whim with an out-of-state friend who wanted to try something different and was very happy to have discovered this neighborhood gem. Tried three meat kebabs, all of which were very flavorful and expertly cooked. Shaved tomato salad was also very well done despite it being a touch early for tomato season, and the little beef pastries were divine. Will be back!
Ovqatlari yahshi, muomalasi ham yahshi, food is delecious and staff is very polite and respectfull ( from urgench)
Thanks delicious foods!! Definitely will visit again

Shurpa and kazan kebap.
Amazing taste, not too spicy and not oversalted at all, which is so rare.
Unbelievable high quality meat!

This is insanely good!

I‚Äôm obsessed with this!

Sangizar is an absolute gem!
The food tastes truly homemade ‚Äî rich, comforting, and full of authentic Asian flavors. You can immediately tell they use fresh ingredients, and the quality really shows in every bite. Prices are very reasonable, especially considering how carefully everything is prepared.
The atmosphere is warm and welcoming, with a calm, relaxing vibe. The staff are friendly, attentive, and make you feel right at home.
Highly recommended for anyone looking for a delicious, cozy meal with great service!
